feed.title: Robotics and Simulation Devroom
feed.subtitle: Site of the Robotics and Simulation Devroom at FOSDEM 2026

entry.title: Robotics and Simulation devroom at Fosdem 2026!

link.title: Robotics and Simulation devroom at Fosdem 2026!

entry.content:
We are pleased to announce that the robotic and simulation DevRoom has been accepted at FOSDEM 2026!

This year we have a full day on Saturday! This means that we will have more space for full-length talk.

Please have a look at the Call for Participation. We are looking forward at seeing all you great talks proposals!
entry.summary: We are pleased to announce that the robotic and simulation DevRoom has been accepted at FOSDEM 2026!
